Commands.Power Break (IX): 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attackTarget: Fair chance 2 turns ATK Down IExtra damage to humanoid types
Commands.Spellblade: Fire melee BRV attackExtra damage to humanoid types

Artifacts.Debuff Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% while an enemy is debuffed.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Power Break (IX): Raises BRV Damage dealt by Power Break (IX) by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Spellblade: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Spellblade by 10%.

Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Power Break (IX) Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Power Break (IX).
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Power Break (IX) Charge: Increases the max uses of Power Break (IX) by 1.
Passives.Spellblade Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Spellblade.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Spellblade Charge: Increases the max uses of Spellblade by 1.
Passives.Man Eater: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to Humanoid-type targets.
Passives.A Captain's Duty: Slightly raises Attack  when HP is under 20%.
Passives.Buff Boost Speed: Slightly raises MAX BRV, SPD with active buffs
Passives.Power Break (IX) Extension: Power Break (IX) use +1When using Power Break (IX): Increased BRV based on party's total MAX BRV Moderate BRV damage boost 5 turns ATK Up IAfter using Power Break (IX): BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (increased damage to humanoid types) for 5 turns
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Spellblade Extension: When using Spellblade: Increased BRV based on party's total MAX BRV Slight damage boost 6 turns MAX BRV Up IIAfter using Spellblade: Triggers additional HP attack, 50% HP damage dealt to non-targets if HP at least 80% of MAX

Weapons.Rune Blade: Increases the potency of Power Break (IX).Raises the success rate of Attack Down and extends its duration.
Weapons.Diamond Sword: Increases Spellblade's potency.Grants Small Defense Up and BRV Regen for 4 turns.
